duties_responsibilities.duty: Driving same stores sales and consistently driving high levels of operational excellence across the district.
Encouraging store teams to exceed customer service standards and coaching and developing store management to optimize performance across the district.
Coordinating with Regional Managers, District Managers, and key partners to ensure result areas are aligned with business strategy, mission, and values.
Actively looking for ways to reduce costs for the business to maximize profit.
Analyzing sales reports and strategically problem solving while also operating the POS system and managing extensive travel and flexible work schedules.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree or equivalent experience required.
